channel.title: Run.bat problem
channel.description:
I have a problem with my Run.bat Everytime i click it, it just opens then closes very quickly i cant read what it says as it goes too fast. Can anyone help me? :confused:
It wasnt like this yesterday, its since i downloaded JDK it wont let me run.
..Jordan..

item.title: Run.bat problem
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

[quote=“d10n, post:4, topic:230265”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=303104.msg2433380#msg2433380 date=1221025006]
Wrong JDK perhaps?
[/quote]
better to keep your mouth shut then let everyone think your a complete idiot.
if you don’t know it. don’t talk about it

it’s your J2se, you need to have a later version
J2se is the program that is used to open applets/clients located on your computer.
Google is my friend[/quote]

ur a douche bag and it is his jdk then all he needs to do is update his run.bat with the new java. go suck a hotdog

Read full topic
